#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin>>n;

    int coins[4]={0};
    //0 -> 5 ; 1 -> 3 ; 2->2; 3->1

    int left = n;
    coins[0] = left/5;
    left = left%5;
    coins[1] = left/3;
    left = left%3;
    coins[2] = left/2;
    left = left%2;
    coins[3] = left/1;
    left = left%1;

    for(int i=0; i<4; i++)
        cout<<coins[i]<<endl;

}
